instruction cycle: Matanho eCPU anotevera kuita kuraira kumwe chete
superscalar architecture: CPU dhizaini inogona kuita akawanda mirairo pawachi kutenderera
kufanotaura kwebazi: Tekinoroji uko iyo CPU inoedza kufungidzira kuti inzira ipi ichaenda
northbridge: Chipset (masisitimu echikuru) akabatanidza iyo CPU kuRAM uye mabhazi anomhanya kwazvo
southbridge: Chipset (masisitimu ekare) aibata zvishoma nezvishoma peripherals uye I/O
hyperthreading: Tekinoroji inobvumira imwechete CPU musimboti kuti iite seakawanda anonzwisisika cores
risc: Yakaderedzwa Yekuraira Seta Kombuta - CPU dhizaini ine mirairo iri nyore
cisc: Complex Instruction Set Computer - CPU dhizaini ine simba, yakaoma mirairo
simd: Imwe Instruction Multiple Data, nzira yekugadzirisa data yakafanana
microarchitecture: Iwo chaiwo maitiro ekuita eCPU's kuraira set
system pane chip: Kubatanidza akawanda macomputer (CPU, GPU, nezvimwewo) pane imwechete chip
embedded system: Kombiyuta system yakatsaurirwa kune rimwe basa, kazhinji mukati memudziyo mukuru
firmware: Software yakachengetwa zvachose pane hardware mudziyo (seBIOS)
overclocking: Kumhanyisa CPU nekumhanya kwakanyanya kupfuura zvayakada
kodhi yekugadzirisa kukanganisa: Tekinoroji yekuona uye kugadzirisa zvikanganiso mu RAM
kunze kwehurongwa: Tekinoroji uko CPU inoita mirairo mune yakanyatsorongeka
quantum computing: Kubatanidza misimboti ye quantum mechanics yekuverengera
neuromorphic computing: Brain-yakafuridzirwa komputa zvivakwa zvakagadzirirwa AI mabasa
